trans-unit.source: Provides the implementation for the binary client formatter sink provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供二進位的用戶端格式器接收提供者的實作。

trans-unit.source: A BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider creates client formatter sinks that use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> to serialize messages for the client channel through which remoting messages flow.
trans-unit.target: BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider 建立用戶端使用的格式器接收<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>來序列化訊息流程透過遠端用戶端通道的訊息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The function of the formatter sink is to generate the necessary headers and serialize the message to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 格式器接收的功能是產生必要的標頭，並序列化訊息到資料流。

trans-unit.source: After the formatter sink, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> is forwarded to all sinks in the channel sink chain through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 格式器接收之後,<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>並透過通道接收鏈結中的所有接收轉都送給<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A>或<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>

trans-unit.source: At this stage, the message has already been serialized and is provided as information only.
trans-unit.target: 在這個階段，已序列化訊息，並提供為參考資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sinks that need to create or modify the message must be placed in the sink chain before the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 需要建立或修改訊息的接收必須放置在之前的格式器的接收鏈結中。

trans-unit.source: You can do this by implementing both the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過實作<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink>介面。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>

trans-unit.source: The formatter sink can then be placed in the sink chain later.
trans-unit.target: 格式器接收可以再放置到接收鏈結中更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Formatter sinks use sink configuration properties to configure the channel at run time.
trans-unit.target: 格式器接收使用接收組態屬性來設定通道在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Sink properties can be specified in a configuration file, or programmatically, inside of a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 接收屬性可以指定在組態檔中，或以程式設計的方式， <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>內

trans-unit.source: In a configuration file all values are represented by strings, but when building a property <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> programmatically, value types can be specified with their native values or with strings.
trans-unit.target: 在組態檔中所有值會都表示字串，但是建置屬性時<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>程式設計角度而言，實值類型可以指定使用其原生值或字串。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sink configuration properties that can be specified for the current sink provider.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個接收器可以針對目前的接收提供者指定的組態屬性。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|指定格式器是否將包含版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: Values are `true` or `false`.| > [!IMPORTANT] > Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 值為`true`或`false`。 | > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用此物件的執行個體受信任的資料或透過不安全的通道是安全性風險。

trans-unit.source: Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel.
trans-unit.target: 僅使用信任的資料，並透過安全的通道，請使用此物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[不受信任的資料安全性風險](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>類別具有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref> class with the given properties and provider data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>具有指定的屬性和資料提供者類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of configuration properties to use with the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>組態屬性的新執行個體所使用的<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"></xref> objects that contain provider data to use with the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>的<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"></xref>物件，其中包含的新執行個體搭配使用的資料提供者<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates a sink chain.
trans-unit.target: 建立接收鏈結。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A> method is called, it creates its own channel sink, forwards the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A> call to the next sink provider in the chain (if there is one), and ensures that the next sink and the current one are linked together.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A>呼叫方法時，它會建立自己的通道接收，轉送<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A>呼叫鏈結 （如果有的話） 中的下一步 接收提供者，並確保下一步 接收與目前已連結在一起。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A>

trans-unit.source: Channel for which this sink chain is being constructed.
trans-unit.target: 正在建構此接收鏈結的通道。

trans-unit.source: URL of object to connect to or the channel URI for the target object.
trans-unit.target: 連接到的物件或通道 URI 目標物件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A channel data object that describes a channel on the remote server.
trans-unit.target: 通道資料的物件，描述在遠端伺服器上的通道。

trans-unit.source: The first sink of the newly formed channel sink chain, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this provider will not or cannot provide a connection for this endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 新建構的通道接收鏈結中，第一個接收或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，指出此提供者將不會或無法提供此端點的連接。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"></xref> in the sink provider chain.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定下一個<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"></xref>接收提供者鏈結中。

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"></xref> in the sink provider chain.
trans-unit.target: 下一步 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"> </xref>接收提供者鏈結中。
